mobify-cloud.title: Mobify Cloud
mobify-cloud.teaser: I helped design and develop the primary customer portal for Mobify. It functions as a Mobify website testing and deployment platform.

ritchie-brothers.title: Ritchie Brothers Auctioneers
ritchie-brothers.teaser: This large-scale heavy equipment auctioneering service needed native apps to compliment it's online bidding experience. I was a designer on the team thats delivering them.
